author: apsallid
body:
#### PR description:

This is the backport of PR #31730 . This is the first time I am doing a backport. I used the latest 
11_1_X integration build (CMSSW_11_1_X_2020-10-27-1100). If I am missing something please let me know.  

#### PR validation:

No conflict while rebasing. All validation tests in the original PR. 

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

A backport of this PR was agreed with the HLT upgrade conveners @fwyzard @trtomei

@rovere @cseez @felicepantaleo @lecriste @pfs @franzoni @mariadalfonso
title: [HGCAL] 11_1_X backport of CLUE with regional em factors
